content: Hello everyone, welcome to this course of IntelliPower.
In the module 2 of this course, we will get you familiarized with the concepts such as
control flow statements using loops like for and while loops in Python.
We will also cover various functions, how you can create the functions and how you can
We will also cover file handling in Python along with the backbone of Python programming
The objective of this course is to help you implement your learnings in a business
problem that is best solved using Python programming.
